nodes.documentation:
@notice Adds an evidence if there is already a manifestation for `hash`.
 @param hash Hash of the manifestation content, for instance IPFS Base58 Hash
nodes.name: addEvidence

devdoc.author: Roberto Garca (http://rhizomik.net/~roberto/)

params.hash: Hash of the manifestation content, for instance IPFS Base58 Hash

params.provider: The address of a contract providing evidence

params.hash: Hash of the manifestation content, for instance IPFS Base58 Hash
Hash of the manifestation content, for instance IPFS Base58 Hash

getManifestation(string).return: The title and authors of the manifestation

initialize(uint32).details: To be used when proxied (upgradeability) to initialize proxy storage

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

manifestAuthorship(string,string).details: To be used when there is just one author, which is considered to be the message sender

params.hash: Hash of the manifestation content, for instance IPFS Base58 Hash
params.title: The title of the manifestation

manifestJointAuthorship(string,string,ad.details: To be used when there are multiple authors

params.additionalAuthors: The additional authors, including the one registering that becomes the first author
params.hash: Hash of the manifestation content, for instance IPFS Base58 Hash
params.title: The title of the manifestation

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

paused().return: true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

devdoc.title: Contract for copyright authorship registration through creations manifestations

addEvidence(string).notice: Adds an evidence if there is already a manifestation for `hash`.

addEvidenceProvider(address).notice: Adds an evidence provider `provider` contract that can then call addEvidence(...) to add evidence.

getEvidenceCount(string).notice: Get the evidence count for the manifestation with `hash`.

getManifestation(string).notice: Retrieve the title and authors of the manifestation with content hash `hash`.

manifestAuthorship(string,string).notice: Register single authorship for `msg.sender` of the manifestation with title `title` and hash `hash`. Requires hash not previously registered or expired.

manifestJointAuthorship(string,string,ad.notice: Register joint authorship for `msg.sender` plus additional authors `additionalAuthors` of the manifestation with title `title` and hash `hash`. Requires hash not previously registered or expired and at most 64 authors, including the one registering.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.
